title: Coinbase CEO Says Binance Settlement Will Turn the Page on Crypto's 'Bad Actors'
description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong says the industry can finally close the chapter of bad actors after the recent settlement between Binance and the U.S. Department of Justice.

title: Coinbase Might Be Forced to Share Your Bitcoin Trading Data With the CFTC
description: The company was recently served with a subpoena pertaining to crypto exchange Bybit. But Coinbase customers with no relationship to that exchange say they’re being targeted too.

title: Memecoin Price Prediction 2023 – 2040: Is MEME A Wise Investment?
description: Meme coins have sparked a lot of buzz in the cryptocurrency world, and one particular token that has gained considerable attention is Memecoin (MEME). As the native ecosystem token of Memeland, which is the web3 venture studio by 9GAG, MEME holds a special place in the meme community. With any new cryptocurrency comes the question ... Read more

title: Venture capital firm A16Z backs Setter with $5 million for Web3 commerce
description: Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) has led a $5 million seed funding round for Setter, a New York-based consumer application. The investment marks a pivotal step for Setter, aimed at revolutionizing the way brands interact with e-commerce through the lens of Web3. Bridging Web2 and Web3 commerce Setter’s innovative platform is designed to assist ... Read more

title: VALR appoints Ben Caselin as CMO for global expansion
description: VALR, Africa's leading crypto exchange by trade volume, has named Ben Caselin as its chief marketing officer (CMO)

title: Coinbase informs select users of CFTC-Bybit probe
description: Brian Armstrong’s U.S. crypto exchange emailed some users about a court summons received from the CFTC regarding rival platform Bybit.
